title: Improper Ban?
body: My account was banned last night for use of 3rd party applications. I am not sure why. I have opened a ticket, but received no reply so far. I use championify for builds, but that's it. My account was recently recovered after being used by someone who hacked the password. The only thing I can think is that someone used something illegal during that time. I have had control of the account for the last 3 months and I have not knowingly used anything during that time. If something on my system is being flagged as illegal 3rd party app I'd like to know what. If it's something that was used during the period when I did not have control of the account I would like my ban lifted as I have control again and have never used anything against TOS as far as I know. Any help on getting this matter reviewed would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: This happened when your account was compromised --- although you've gone through recovery, the suspension for the action came much later. I've since removed the ban on the account. Keep in mind that this is an exception -- please be sure to practice good account security! We have an article here with some pretty goods tips: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664

I do believe this is when a third party software was used on my account(period of time my account was hacked). I do have the ticket number from the hacked incident. Any help will be much appreciated.

Yup I was banned too. Been playing for 4 years and never used any kind of hacks or mods. My account was hacked a month ago but riot was able to get it back to me buy now I was banned for a 3rd party software but I've never used anything except dxtory and action recorder, God I hope they can get my account back.

I got a response at least, but it was of no help.

"Hello Summoner,

Your account has been permanently suspended following the use of scripts, hacks, exploits or unauthorized third-party programs in League of Legends. Accounts that are caught using hacks to gain an unfair competitive advantage are subject to permanent suspension. We work hard to preserve a fair and competitive environment in League of Legends. Regardless of intent, use of unauthorized third-party programs is explicitly against the Terms of Use, which can be found here:

NA: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/legal/termsofuse

Keep in mind that account sharing of any kind is also against the Terms of Use. You are responsible for all activity on your account, so be sure to keep your account information to yourself.

We won't be able to go into the specifics of an account's exploit abuse, as divulging this information could compromise future investigations. Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.

MebuChan
Player Support Specialist
Riot Games"

I need an actual person to review my case not a canned response. I have NEVER used anything against TOS to my knowledge. My account was compromised at one point due to NO FAULT OF MY OWN. If something was used during this period I should not be held responsible. This account has over 100 champions and 20 rune pages. It is over 3 years old. I need an actual review of the case or contact with someone that can explain to me what EXACTLY is going on. I have spent real money on this account since reacquiring it and will be issuing a charge back on any money spent if I can not get a response what EXACTLY is getting this account banned.
